BasicValues.EffectConnectDescription: The weapon's damage is forwarded to the\npower system of the target.

Adds punch-through effect to projectiles
destroying more blocks in a line if the
damage is enough to keep the projectile
alive
Adds piercing effect to beams and projectiles\nincreasing damage done to blocks \nat the cost of reduced shield damage
Adds explosion effect to the weapon\nhitting up to 6 blocks at once.\nAdds extra radius to missiles and pulse.
Adds breaking effect to the weapon
Adds push effect to the weapon
Adds pull effect to the weapon
Does extra damage against shields,\nbut less against blocks
